name: Tomato and Bacon Breakfast Sandwiches
description: A perfect summer tomato is a thing of beauty. Put yours to use in this simply satisfying sandwich that's a cousin of the BLT.
recipeIngredient: 3 slices bacon, cut in half crosswise
1 English muffin (store-bought or homemade), split and toasted

recipeInstructions.text: Cook bacon in a skillet over medium-low heat, turning occasionally, until completely crisp, about 5 minutes total. Drain on a paper towel–lined plate.
Spread both English muffin halves with mayonnaise. Lay tomato slices on bottom half, season with salt, and top with bacon. Close sandwich and serve.
